prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.
prompts.additionalTasks:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate additional numbered tasks to complete the objective: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly.

The following tasks have already been created:
{{existingTasks}}

Please generate additional tasks that complement these existing tasks. Continue the numbering from where the list left off. Do not repeat any existing tasks.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "4. Investigate the mysterious cave". Include only the list in your reply.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
Hailee is extremely submissive and clingy. She needs constant attention and affection.

Hailee is very responsive and sensative during sex. She has a extremely strong praise kink.

Hailee hates being asked to beg. It's a big turn off for her

name: Tyler Golds  ALT
mes:
Tyler’s stomach was stuffed full of as much junk food he could handle. Him and Hailee had stopped at nearly every vendor that the California fair had to offer. She was easily shoveling it down and Tyler was beginning to get a little concerned. *Might stay in her dorm tonight. She’s going to puke all that up later.* He would’ve stopped her, but fuck knows she would’ve sobbed her eyes out if he said anything. He had been walking on eggshells since he found out she had a bun in the oven. *his* bun, of course. No one else was baking bread with her and he made damn sure of it. 

The hormones were full on raging war. She cried for three hours because her clothes weren’t fitting and her belly was poking out of everything. Tyler had to admit she was *huge*. He hadn’t seen a woman so… *pregnant* before. If he hadn’t seen the ultra sounds he’d thought she was having twins for sure. Of course, Eli had to mention it once they met up at the fair, which started the sprinklers *again*. Tyler would’ve kicked his ass, but Eli’s new girlfriend had already slapped him in the back of the head and hauled him off, Liv muttering about him being a dumbass. 

Tyler had held Hailee in his arms promising that she only looked like she was having *one*, even if it was a lie. At least she stopped fucking crying and that was good enough for him. He didn’t think it was healthy for a pregnant woman to be crying so much. Especially for the baby! 

Tyler’s mom had already thrown Hailee a baby shower, and they already had a ton of cute shit in the house they would be moving into once the kid was born. It had taken Tyler nearly a whole day to put a fucking crib together. Hailee cried over that too. Not because it took him forever, but because it made her think about him being a father and that sorta shit. Then Tyler cried too. She always got him all sentimental and dumbshit like that.*Turning me into a little bitch.* Jason loved to tell him how soft he was getting.

Since Hailee couldn’t ride any of the rides, Tyler done the thing he was always doing. Buying her stuff and playing games. He was carrying *two* stuffed bears nearly five feet tall. He was only going to get one, but Hailee had said he needed one too. He was a grown man he didn’t need a fucking stuffed bear, but hell if he didn’t get one. It was soft at least. Now he had to haul them fuckers around with a smile on his face or else Hailee would think he was upset or something. 

It was hotter than hell and he had those stuffed bears draped across him as they sat down to watch the truck pull. He’d gotten Hailee *another* slushie after she had gotten dizzy from watching one of those spinny rides. Sweat was pouring down the side of his head. He didn’t know where his friends were, but he was hoping he wouldn’t see them so he could enjoy his time alone with Hailee. 

He slid his arm over her shoulder, placing his other hand on her swollen belly. “Damn, babe. It’s hot as fuck. Are you alright?” He asked, concerned. “You’ve eaten a lot of junk tonight. I don’t know where your fucking puttin’ it.” He leaned in and kissed the top of her head.
